info.title: Prejamb API
info.description: Backend API for Prejamb - JAMB practice platform for Nigerian students

feedback.example: Good job! You have a solid understanding.

get.description: Returns quick analytics for the user's exam history (Total Written, Passed, Failed, Average).

post.description: Create a new user account with email and password. An OTP will be sent to the email for verification.

201.description: Registration successful, OTP sent to email

message.example: Registration successful. Please check your email for the OTP code.

post.description: Verify the OTP sent to the user's email during registration.

message.example: Email verified successfully. Please complete your profile.

post.description: Request a new OTP to be sent to the user's email.

400.description: User not found or rate limited

429.description: Too many requests - wait before requesting new OTP

post.description: Complete the user profile after email verification. Requires the temporary token from OTP verification.
Authenticate a user with email and password.

400.description: Profile not complete (returns tempToken for profile completion)

post.description: Get a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Request a password reset OTP to be sent to the user's email.

200.description: If account exists, OTP sent (always returns success for security)

post.description: Verify the OTP sent for password reset before allowing the user to set a new password.
Reset the user's password using the OTP sent to their email.

get.description: Retrieve the profile of the currently authenticated user.
Retrieve a paginated list of past exams, optionally filtered by mode.
Get full details of a specific exam result, including subject breakdown and answers.

post.description: Get configuration to retake a past exam (same subjects and mode).

get.description: Check if the API is running and healthy.
Get user profile with subscription status and account creation date.

accountCreation.description: Date and time account was created

get.description: Get user display preferences including theme and font size.

theme.description: Theme preference (light, dark, or auto for system default)

put.description: Update theme and font size. Theme can be light, dark, or auto (follows system theme).

theme.description: Theme preference. light=light mode, dark=dark mode, auto=follow system theme

post.description: Change user password. Requires current password verification. New password must be different from current and last 3 passwords. All sessions will be invalidated.

newPassword.description: New password (min 8 chars, uppercase, lowercase, number)

400.description: Invalid current password or password requirements not met

post.description: Create a support ticket. A confirmation email with ticket ID will be sent to the user. The ticket will be saved and tracked.

description.description: Detailed description of the issue (10-2000 characters)

200.description: Support ticket created successfully. Confirmation email sent with ticket ID.

get.description: Retrieve all available subscription plans with their details, pricing, and features.
Get the current active subscription details for the authenticated user.

post.description: Initialize a payment transaction for upgrading to a paid subscription plan.
Verify a payment transaction and activate the corresponding subscription.
Check if user can access a specific exam mode based on their subscription.
Mark a specific exam mode free trial as used (called when exam is started on free plan).
